attributes.action: Remove Britain from the sovereignty of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for all those who would like Britain to reclaim its sovereignty from the European Union and become its own ruler once again. This petition has nothing to do with race or religion, it is an appeal to the patriotic British men/women who feel that Britain should no longer be apart of something that does nothing but impose other peoples laws on us and uses us as a bridge to the US. So sign on if your Pro-No

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/JoinEFTA/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
